pull.title: [RPC] Don't do slow transaction lookup when txindex is enabled
pull.body:
For `getrawtransaction`, instead of always doing the slow transaction lookup, only do it when txindex is disabled.

Partially fixes #11506

events.message: Don't do slow transaction lookup when txindex is enabled

rename.from: Don't do slow transaction lookup when txindex is enabled
rename.to: [RPC] Don't do slow transaction lookup when txindex is enabled

issue.title: getrawtransaction delay too long on non-existent txid
issue.body:
As of 0.15.0.0, and 0.15.0.1, the `getrawtransaction` call lags when requesting non-existent transaction IDs. 

Tested on Ubuntu 14.04 and 16.04.

Reproduce with:

```$ bitcoin-cli getrawtransaction `openssl rand -hex 32` 1```

events.body:
This change makes a lot of sense IMO, congratulations on doing it in a single-line change.
utACK 8047f36

issue.title: Avoid slow transaction search with txindex enabled
issue.body: This is an alternative to #11507 where a slow search is not attempted (in any case) if `txindex` is enabled.

events.body: Closing in favor of #11529 (sorry for the review churn)

issue.title: Backport bitcoin #11529: Avoid slow transaction search with txindex enabled (Joo Barbosa)
issue.body:
7a5f930 Avoid slow transaction search with txindex enabled (Joo Barbosa)

Pull request description:

  This is an alternative to #11507 where a slow search is not attempted (in any case) if `txindex` is enabled.
